nodes.text: Podracers Go! is a Level 1 DK Reader by Simon Beecroft released in 2007. It introduces readers to the exciting sport of podracing and the many personalities that race.

Want to know more about the fast and furious Podracers? Then jump aboard and discover all about them in this action-packed reader. Filled with pictures of all your favorite races, like Anakin against Sebulba, it's an out-of-this world read. And don't forget, there's a galaxy-full of "DK Star Wars" books to collect.
